entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Orillia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:52 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 12:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -4.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: -5.5°C
Wind: SE 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 12:24 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:24 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 12:24 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
